doc:
Jim Backus https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jim_Backus 0 James Gilmore Backus (February 25, 1913 – July 3, 1989) was an American radio, television, film, and voice actor. Among his most famous roles were the voice of nearsighted cartoon character Mr. Magoo, the rich Hubert Updike III on the radio version of The Alan Young Show, Joan Davis' character's husband (a domestic court judge) on TV's I Married Joan, James Dean's character's father in Rebel Without a Cause, and Thurston Howell III, on the 1960s sitcom Gilligan's Island. He also starred in his own show of one season, The Jim Backus Show, also known as Hot Off the Wire. An avid golfer, Backus made the 36-hole cut at the 1964 Bing Crosby Pro-Am tournament. James_Gilmore_Backus ( February_25_,_1913 – July_3_,_1989 ) was an_American_radio , television , film , and voice_actor . Among his_most_famous_roles were the_voice of nearsighted_cartoon_character_Mr._Magoo , the_rich_Hubert_Updike_III on the_radio_version of The_Alan_Young_Show , Joan_Davis '_character 's_husband ( a_domestic_court_judge ) on TV 's_I_Married_Joan , James_Dean 's_character 's_father in Rebel Without a_Cause , and Thurston_Howell_III , on the_1960s_sitcom_Gilligan 's_Island . He also starred in his_own_show of one_season , The_Jim_Backus_Show , also_known as Hot Off the_Wire . An_avid_golfer , Backus made the_36-hole_cut at the_1964_Bing_Crosby_Pro-Am_tournament .
